description.message: We control the merging of Github by title and branch.

explanation3.message: The priority rule is from the top

exampleContents1.message: If you add "[WIP]" or "[wip]" to the title, you can not merge it into the master branch

exampleContents2.message: If you do not add a "Release" to the title, you can not merge it into the master branch or staging branch

exampleContents3.message: You can merge it into the master branch only from release branch
